page.title: 17Modern Culture
page.content: {Break Dancing}is dancing using your whole body which is popular with teenagers.It is done on a square of lino and people compete in{Breakin {Burns}(competitions).A few people dress{punk}these days.Their hair is spiked with gel and is often dyed bright{pink,green or blue. Disco {dancing}is popular where young people dance to loud music from pop groups such as{"Duran Duran","Wham"}and {"Sister Sledge"}.You can buy video_ discs which are music and pictures and are played on video machines.In our class 32% own video recorders.{Fashion in clothes and music are often changing.Television and magazines such as{"Smash Hits"}and{"Jackie"}encourage people to be in fashion.At our school "Baggies"(loose trousers),luminous socks,earings(for girls and boys)and small pigtails are in fashion.
